mapper.insert:
insert into pcomment (pcomment_id, pcomment_pid, pboard_id, mem_id,pcomment_content, pcomment_cdate, pcomment_isremove) values (PCOMMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{pcomment_pid}, #{pboard_id}, #{mem_id}, #{pcomment_content}, SYSDATE, 'N')
select pcomment_seq.currval from dual
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, level, pcomment_id, pcomment_pid, pboard_id, mem_id, LPAD(' ↳ ', 5 * (level - 1), ' ') || pcomment_content AS pcomment_content, CASE WHEN level = 1 THEN pcomment_content ELSE pcomment_content END AS pcomment_content, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 60 THEN '방금전' WHEN (SYSDATE - pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 60 * 60 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR((SYSDATE - pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 / 60), '분전') WHEN (SYSDATE - pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 24 * 60 * 60 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR((SYSDATE - pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 / (60 * 60)), '시간전') ELSE TO_CHAR(pcomment_cdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS pcomment_cdate, pcomment_isremove FROM pcomment WHERE pboard_id = #{pboard_id} START WITH pcomment_pid = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR pcomment_id = pcomment_pid ORDER SIBLINGS BY pcomment_id DESC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startPcomment} AND #{endPcomment}

select PCOMMENT_ID,PCOMMENT_PID,PBOARD_ID,MEM_ID,PCOMMENT_CONTENT, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - Pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 60 THEN '방금전' WHEN (SYSDATE - Pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 60 * 60 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR((SYSDATE - pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 / 60), '분전') WHEN (SYSDATE - Pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 24 * 60 * 60 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR((SYSDATE - pcomment_cdate) * 24 * 60 * 60 / (60 * 60)), '시간전') ELSE TO_CHAR(pcomment_cdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS pcomment_cdate ,PCOMMENT_MDATE,PCOMMENT_RDATE,PCOMMENT_ISREMOVE from pcomment where pcomment_id=#{pcomment_id}
